jd: From: John Richardson, Themesoft Inc john@themesoft.com Reply to: john@themesoft.com Job Description: Job title: Senior Developer Location: McLean, VA (hybrid) Job Requirements: • 8+ years of Core Java development experience, familiar with Java 8 or higher. • Able to deliver end to end project. • Experience with java development and aware of java patterns. • Experience in Spring Boot uses for development. • Experience of development project and developed functionalities using java, j2ee. • Must have AWS experience.. Must have angular experince • AWS services (S3, SQS, SNS,ECS, Lambda, AWS Cloud watch etc.) • Experience on AWS deployed application. • Experience on Oracle or Postgres or DynamoDB to perform SQL. • Agile/scrum development experience. • Good collaboration and communication skills. • Ready to learn new technologies and perform POC on it. • Ability to diagnose prod issues and defects. Skills required: Java, Spring boot, Microservices and AWS Regards, John Richardson, Technical Recruiter Themesoft Inc., john@themesoft.com
